place.name: ALPHAMSTONE
place.gazetteerText: ALPHAMSTONE, a parish in Sudbury district, Essex; near the river Stour, 2½ miles WNW of Bures r. station, and 5 S of Sudbury. Post Town, Bures under Colchester. Acres, 1,557. Real property, £2,614. Pop., 317. Houses, 72. The property is divided among a few. The living is a rectory in the diocese of Rochester. Value £257.* Patron, the Lord Chancellor. The church is tolerable. Charities, £13. (In 1870-72, John Marius Wilson's Imperial Gazetteer of England and Wales)
